subject: Re: I shouldn't show this--but...
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
FS:  I wish you would upload a pic or two from time to time.  :)

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
> What's not shown is the back, I had to add an extension for the 
batteries. I designed and built a board just for this size RS 
enclosure, that's why all the controls, and speaker are in the 
center. The board stands on edge in the top part of the box, and tthe 
batteries are in the bottom. This is an LA1135 based receiver.
>  
>  Frank-S
